item.title: Animated Green Screen Background for Video - Upwork
item.description:
We need an experienced animator to create a captivating background for a green-screen video shoot.

The animation will feature:
A black background
13 yellow/gold light pulses traveling along predetermined paths
Small light bursts when pulses hit smaller circles/squares
Large starbursts illuminate a vehicle and roller coaster track when pulses hit larger circles/squares
Random or sequential animation with fading between bursts
The animation should feel energetic, and exciting, and align with our existing branding.

Skills and Experience:
Expertise in 2D animation
Proficient in Adobe After Effects or similar software
Strong understanding of visual storytelling and motion design
Ability to deliver high-quality video files suitable for green screen compositing

Project Timeline:
We are looking to hire immediately and need this project completed within the next 3/4 hours.

Additional Information:
We will provide you with our logo, website wallpaper, and color palette for reference.

The successful freelancer will be hired for your BuyFact work for a long time.

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 21, 2024 09:11 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Adobe After Effects, 2D Animation, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Animation, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Education, Explainer Video
Skills: Adobe After Effects, 2D Animation, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Animation, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Education, Explainer Video
Country: Bangladesh
click to apply

item.title: Podcast Editing and Production (Audio and Video) - Upwork
item.description:
We are a brand new podcast. We are looking for someone to test out, with a potential long term contract depending on performance.

We already have a brand, design assets, and raw recording files

This is what we are looking for;
- Teaser episode (30s - 1 min) of mesh of episode snippets (Video and Audio)
-  Production & Editing  Podcast Intro and Outro (Video and Audio)
-  Production & Editing of 1st and Second episode (Video and Audio)
- 5x (10-15 second) social media clips (video) per episode, of first and second episode for promotion

item.title: Video Editor and Ad Creator for Dropshipping Store - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor and ad creator for a brand new shop that will turn into a branded store. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and producing engaging videos for our dropshipping store first and then branded store. Your main tasks will include selecting and editing footage, adding text and graphics, and optimizing videos for different platforms. Additionally, you will be in charge of creating eye-catching ad creatives that drive traffic and conversions. If you know how to create viral videos and materials that convert - you are who we are looking for.

  Required skills:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Experience in creating and editing videos for social media platforms (e.g., Facebook, Instagram)
  - Strong understanding of visual storytelling and video composition
  - Ability to add text, graphics, and effects to enhance videos
  - Familiarity with dropshipping business model and product promotion

Step 1: 1-2 videos as a test to see if we can work together
Step 2: create road map for social media materials, video drops etc.
Step 3: consistent collaboration if you are a match

Hourly Range: $5.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 09:08 UTC
Category: Ecommerce Management
Skills:Video Editing, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing for SEO Application - Upwork
item.description:
first of quick task for 8/10 hours

We are looking for a skilled video editor to create a promotional video for our application . The video should be engaging, concise, and highlight the key features and benefits of our app. As a video editor, you will need to have a strong understanding of SEO concepts and be able to effectively communicate them through visuals. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating videos for marketing purposes and be proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro. Prior knowledge of app promotion and SEO strategies is a plus.

- Video editing
- SEO knowledge
- Creativity

- Communication skills

item.description:
Hello dear editor!
I'm looking for a person who will produce 20 videos for a new youtube channels

One is about animals and the second one is popular science. Total of 20 episodes per month. The episodes are 8 to 14 minutes long. I provide the script and voice over but very much count on the right attitude and willingness to look for solutions. Sticking to a deadline is very important to me.

The rate is $60 per episode = 20x60$ = $1200 per month.

I DO NOT NEGOTIATE THIS RATE, IF IT IS NOT OK FOR YOU THEN DO NOT APPLY

Looking forward for your responses!

item.title: IMMEDIATE START! Professional designer/agency need for high quality social media design assets! - Upwork
item.description:
We are working on a project which requires a higher level of design expertise then our teams typically produce. We have an urgent deadline of getting initial confidence in our ability to produce the design by today, so I will be hiring today for this, and looking to have 3-4 assets turned out today after hiring.. with about 15 more assets produced over the next 3-4 days.

Please see details below:

- Initially we made a bit of a mood board, and mocked up some examples of social media posts we would produce, this is here: https://docs.google.com/drawings/d/1Lmx9B5tRMtIX3hhvhJsZgbKGcJ5qPHMCOyBxto0vS6I/edit?usp=sharing

- Client reviewed that and provided the following feedback here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/13V30HC9xvJV25o_qt0vJsG8PY2bHW7yh/view?usp=sharing , with these being the social posts they referenced for examples: https://gyazo.com/a604764ea9b99f4d3d8efb5933c89f1f

- I provided the following instructions to our current design team here (this is what I would like followed primarily): https://docs.google.com/drawings/d/1PBiKWbq8CcGWD2PXi90VR5lA1ioz7HciYOtkcAz4P5U/edit?usp=sharing , with video describing those feedbacks here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1JPkIj_OJcX7sciLkIeE7mVYyLkCJVE0s/view?usp=sharing

I am needed the three above bullets reviewed, and then the board / grid layout updated with the assets that match the look and feel the client is trying to achieve.

Important aspects:

1. Layers being more integrated together and strategically placed matters
2. Typography being consistent matters to them
3. Attention to detail on minor placements and details matters

IMPORTANT:
To make my decision on hiring I will need either 1 of 2 things:
1. A single square from the instagram board layout designed in the style needed to see if you are capable of the design and quality needed.
2. If you do not want to do #1 because of time or not being paid yet, I will accept a portfolio of yours showing similar styled assets to show the skill you can do. If you do #1 it likely is higher chance of hiring because I am confident the work is yours and the turnaround time is quick.

Let me know if any questions!

Hourly Range: $15.00-$65.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 08:44 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Brand Identity & Guidelines, Social Media Imagery, Graphic Design, Brand Design, Design Theory
Skills: Brand Identity & Guidelines, Social Media Imagery, Graphic Design, Brand Design, Design Theory
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Virtual Assistant for Social Media and Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a reliable and efficient virtual assistant to handle our social media presence on LinkedIn and YouTube. The ideal candidate should have experience in managing social media accounts, creating engaging content, and video editing. As a virtual assistant, your responsibilities will include developing and implementing social media strategies, scheduling and posting content, engaging with followers, and analyzing social media performance. You should also possess excellent video editing skills to create professional and engaging videos for our YouTube channel. If you are organized, detail-oriented, and have a passion for social media and video editing, we would love to hear from you.

Skills required:
- Social media management
- Content creation
- Video editing

item.title: Help us make GIFs for Facebook Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are a digital media and games company. On a daily basis, we reach millions of users with our content, projects and games, such as the Nametests Instant Game on Facebook. We are a creative team pursuing our mission to 'make people smile'; we are committed to entertaining people and aim to inspire their world!

We use the latest technology in order to be highly adaptive. Combined with our agile spirit and great teamwork, this allows us to achieve:

More than 500 million people who played our games
More than 120 million fans on Facebook
Content and minigames translated into more than 40 different languages
The social sweethearts are looking for passionate and dynamic colleagues who would like to join us in continuing to create a more colourful world.


We are looking for a person to create GIFs for our Facebook Ads, and eventually short videos. Looking forward to hearing from you! :)


Posted On: June 21, 2024 08:23 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Social Media Imagery, GIF Based on Image or Video, Video Editing, Facebook Advertising

item.title: Professional Short Promotional Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
I'm seeking a talented and experienced video creator to produce a high-quality, professional promotional video. The video should be approximately 1 minute in length and will highlight our brand, culminating with our logo at the end. The style should be engaging, dynamic, and professional, similar to the example provided, but elevated in terms of quality and professionalism.
Responsibilities:

Conceptualize and create a promotional video based on our brand and requirements.
Ensure the video is around 1 minute in length.
Incorporate our logo at the end of the video.
Utilize high-quality visuals and sound to create an engaging and professional video.
Deliver the final video in a format suitable for various digital platforms.
Requirements:

Proven experience in creating promotional videos.
Strong portfolio showcasing previous work.
Ability to deliver high-quality, professional videos within the specified timeframe.
Excellent communication skills and ability to understand and implement feedback.

To Apply:

item.ns0:encoded:
I'm seeking a talented and experienced video creator to produce a high-quality, professional promotional video. The video should be approximately 1 minute in length and will highlight our brand, culminating with our logo at the end. The style should be engaging, dynamic, and professional, similar to the example provided, but elevated in terms of quality and professionalism.
Responsibilities:

Conceptualize and create a promotional video based on our brand and requirements.
Ensure the video is around 1 minute in length.
Incorporate our logo at the end of the video.
Utilize high-quality visuals and sound to create an engaging and professional video.
Deliver the final video in a format suitable for various digital platforms.
Requirements:

Proven experience in creating promotional videos.
Strong portfolio showcasing previous work.
Ability to deliver high-quality, professional videos within the specified timeframe.
Excellent communication skills and ability to understand and implement feedback.

To Apply:
Please provide your portfolio, relevant work samples, and a brief description of your approach to creating promotional videos. Include any ideas you have for this project and your estimated timeline for completion.
